meanings.definition: A member of the Turkic-speaking people living in Tartary.
meanings.sent1: The Tartars were known for their skilled horsemanship.
meanings.sent2: Many Tartars have preserved their traditional customs.
meanings.sent3: The Tartars decided to host a grand feast to celebrate their victory.
meanings.sent4: She galloped through the field like a wild Tartar on horseback.
meanings.sent5: The Tartars' colorful clothing made them stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A hard yellowish deposit on the teeth, consisting of organic secretions and food particles.
meanings.sent1: Regular brushing helps prevent tartars from forming on your teeth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist removed the tartars during the cleaning session.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the tartars on his teeth were like tiny rock formations.
meanings.sent4: The tartars on her teeth were as stubborn as a mule.
meanings.sent5: The tartars made his smile look less bright and clean.
